definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: The arrival of spring flower season, calla different patterns.
sentences.chinese: 在春暖花的季節，馬蹄蓮形態各異。

sentences.english: A simple calla quick hello, Where have you been?
sentences.chinese: 一個簡單快速馬蹄蓮你好，在那裏了，你呢？

sentences.english: Calla southern Africa country of origin, was born near the river or swamp.
sentences.chinese: 馬蹄蓮原產非洲南部，生於河流旁或沼澤中。

sentences.english: The the stem tuber buds is the appropriate ex-plants of rapid propagation of colorful Zantedeschia.
sentences.chinese: 彩色馬蹄蓮快速繁殖的適宜外植體是塊莖和塊莖芽。

sentences.english: This treatment could delay senescence and enhance the ornamental value effectively.
sentences.chinese: 該處理能有效延緩馬蹄蓮切花衰老，提高觀賞品質。

sentences.english: Beautiful calla lilies in the flower market attract me.
sentences.chinese: 花卉市場里美麗的馬蹄蓮吸引住了我的目光。

sentences.english: Burn treatment, amount of fresh calla lily tubers, mash and external application.
sentences.chinese: 治燙傷，鮮馬蹄蓮塊莖適量，搗爛外敷。

definition: Yilan county in Harbin 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Heilongjiang
(agriculture) to introduce a new plant variety
tender and beautiful/also written 嬌艷|娇艳
